sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EmployeeService } from './employee.service'; import { Employee } from './Employee'; import { Subject } from 'rxjs'; import { ColDef, GridOptions } from 'ag-grid'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employeesTest', templateUrl: './employees.component.html', providers: [EmployeeService] }) export class EmployeesTestComponent implements OnInit{ employee: Employee = new Employee(); employees: Employee[] = []; gridOptions: GridOptions; //columnDefs: ColDef[] = [ // { field: 'Id' }, // { field: 'Отдел' }, // { field: 'Полное имя' }, // { field: 'Дата рождения' }, // { field: 'Дата приема на работу' }, // { field: 'Зарплата' }, //]; //rowSelection: 'single' | 'multiple' = 'single'; //rowData!: Employee[]; constructor(private employeeService: EmployeeService) { this.gridOptions = { enableSorting: true, enableFilter: true }; this.gridOptions.columnDefs = [ { headerName: 'Id', field: "value" }, { headerName: 'Отдел', field: "value" }, { headerName: 'Полное имя', field: "value" }, { headerName: 'Дата рождения', field: "value" }, { headerName: 'Дата приема на работу', field: "value" }, { headerName: 'Зарплата', field: "value" } ]; this.gridOptions.rowData = this.employees.map(function (item) { return { "value": item }; }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadEmployees(); } loadEmployees() { this.employeeService.getEmployees() .subscribe(data => { this.employees = data; }); } save() { if (this.employee.id == null) { this.employeeService.createEmployee(this.employee) .subscribe((data: Employee) => this.employees.push(data)); } else { this.employeeService.updateEmployee(this.employee) } this.cancel(); } delete(p: Employee) { this.employeeService.deleteEmployee(p.id) .subscribe(() => this.employeeService.getEmployees() .subscribe(data => { this.employees = data})); this.cancel() } editEmployee(p: Employee) { this.employee = p; } add() { this.cancel(); } cancel() { this.employee = new Employee(); } }
